attributes.action: create cc/ bhp limits on all new car drivers for a period of two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To create a staggered learning curve to allow all new drivers to become confident(not OVER confident)and capable road users by introducing a cc/bhp limit on all cars for a period of two years from the date test is passed. 
aim to reduce road deaths in young people by restricting the type of car they can buy - Roads not race tracks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
